page.title: 19Adult Hobbies
page.content: { 1 Rambling Walking has become an increasingly popular hobby in the 1980's.Rambling groups have been set up,mainly in urban areas,encouraging people to get out into the open air and make use of the available foot-paths(many of which are old pack horse trails and railways).The pastime has been given further support by recent medical evidence linking heart disease with a lack of regular exercise. { 2 Wine Making Much of the increase in home brewing has no doubt been caused by higher prices of commercially produced wine. This,however,overlooks the satisfaction which can be gained from this hobby.Considerable patience is required for optimum results, contrasting pleasantly with the speed and pressures of modern day life.
